verses.verse: Then there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8141>year;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1245>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> It is for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and for his <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H4191>slew<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them; (now the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%> were not of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites;<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>slay<s%> them in his <S%H7065>zeal<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>)

Why <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for you? and with <S%H4100>which<s%> shall I make the <S%H3722>atonement,<s%> that you may <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>

And the <S%H1393>Gibeonites<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We will have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> nor <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> nor of his <S%H1004>house;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> for us shall you <S%H4191>kill<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> that will I <S%H6213>do<s%> for you.

And they <S%H559>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> The <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3615>consumed<s%> us, and that <S%H1819>devised<s%> against us that we should be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H3320>remaining<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

Let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> to us, and we will <S%H3363>hang<s%> them up to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> did <S%H972>choose.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them.

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> <S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> that was <S%H996>between<s%> them, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H764>Armoni<s%> and <S%H4648>Mephibosheth;<s%> and the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> whom she <S%H3205>brought<s%> up for <S%H5741>Adriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H4259>Meholathite:<s%>

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1393>Gibeonites,<s%> and they <S%H3363>hanged<s%> them in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> all <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and were put to <S%H4191>death<s%> in the days of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> days, in the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

And <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H5186>spread<s%> it for her on the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> from the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5413>dropped<s%> on them out of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5414>suffered<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> nor the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H7532>Rizpah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah,<s%> the <S%H6370>concubine<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> had <S%H6213>done.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead,<s%> <S%H1568><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H1589>stolen<s%> them from the <S%H7339>street<s%> of <S%H1052>Bethshan,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H8511>hanged<s%> them, <S%H3117>when<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in <S%H1533>Gilboa:<s%>

And he <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of them that were <S%H3363>hanged.<s%>

And the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> they in the <S%H776>country<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> in <S%H6762>Zelah,<s%> in the <S%H6913>sepulcher<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and they <S%H6213>performed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> And <S%H310>after<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants<s%> with him, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> against the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> waxed <S%H5774>faint.<s%>

And <S%H3430>Ishbibenob,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant,<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of whose <S%H7013>spear<s%> weighed <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H4948>weight,<s%> he being <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H2319>new<s%> sword, <S%H559>thought<s%> to have <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

But <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H5826>succored<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H4191>killed<s%> him. <S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> out with us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that you <S%H3518>quench<s%> not the <S%H5216>light<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> that there was <S%H5750>again<s%> a <S%H4421>battle<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> at <S%H1359>Gob:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H5444>Sibbechai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H5593>Saph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was of the <S%H3211>sons<s%> of the <S%H7497>giant.<s%>

And there was <S%H5750>again<s%> a <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1359>Gob<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> where <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3296>Jaareoregim,<s%> a <S%H1022>Bethlehemite,<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> the brother of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H1663>Gittite,<s%> the <S%H6086>staff<s%> of whose <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver's<s%> <S%H4500>beam.<s%>

And there was <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> where was a <S%H376>man<s%> of great <S%H4055>stature,<s%> that had on every <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>fingers,<s%> and on every <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H676>toes,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> in <S%H4557>number;<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant.<s%>
And when he <S%H2778>defied<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimeah<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> him.

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to the <S%H7497>giant<s%> in <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
